# Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Network – Kejimkujik

**Solicitation Number:** 5000082807  
**Publication Date:** November 21, 2024  
**Tender Closing Date:** January 6, 2025, 15:00 (EST)  
**Contract Duration:** April 1, 2025 – December 31, 2027

## Background Information

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) invites bids for the provision of daily technical support services at the Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Network (CAPMoN) Kejimkujik National Park site. The contract requires a contractor to provide technical support to attend to the station and retrieve, process, and ship samples according to the CAPMoN Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs). The contractor will also perform daily duties, including reading and recording gauges, diagnostics, and regular servicing, troubleshooting, and minor repair of monitoring equipment.

## Requirements

*   The contractor will provide technical support services, 7 days a week, 52 weeks a year, at the CAPMoN Kejimkujik National Park site.
*   The contractor will retrieve and process samples according to the CAPMoN SOPs.
*   The contractor will ship samples to the CAPMoN National Laboratory for analysis.
*   The contractor will perform daily duties, including reading and recording gauges, diagnostics, and regular servicing, troubleshooting, and minor repair of monitoring equipment.

## Contract Requirements

*   The contractor must adhere to the Site Operations Reference Manuals and any amendments.
*   The contractor will be required to attend on-site training provided by ECCC technical staff.
*   The contractor must be able to operate a variety of monitoring equipment and perform troubleshooting and minor repairs.

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the submission of a proposal that outlines the contractor's understanding of the requirements, their experience, and their approach to delivering the services. The evaluation will also assess the contractor's ability to meet the technical requirements and their commitment to quality.
